alert.note: Alert for Boundary (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 14 at 12:11PM MDT until June 15 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Spokane WA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Idaho... Moyie River at Eastport affecting Boundary County. For the Moyie River...including Eastport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Moyie River at Eastport. * WHEN...From this afternoon to midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Lowland flooding occurs between Eastport and Addie. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM PDT Tuesday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to a reading of 9.1 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening to 8.7 feet and remain in action stage (near bankfull) though the week. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 am PDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Moyie River Eastport 9.0 8.8 Tue 9 am PDT 8.8 8.6 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM PDT.
